title: Does riot have any idea about how to match games to make them fair ?

embed.description: Snaggy is an image hosting service that lets you paste images from your clipboard directly online.

body:
I just simply dont undestand how riot makes the decision that  2 silver people have a chance against diamonds and plats, do they actually put any effort in the matching system or they just throw random people in the games ? 
Obviously im on the loosing team.
